rows.label: qst002301_msg0001
rows.name:
Ah, you've come at the
perfect time, mo. I have
a favor to ask of you, mo.

rows.label: qst002301_msg0002
rows.name:
Don't worry, it's simple, mo. I
want you to question the warrior
monks in the cathedral, mo.

rows.label: qst002301_msg0003
rows.name:
Moruru especially wants to
know the number of guards in
the cathedral at night, mo.

rows.label: qst002301_msg0004
rows.name:
I may not look it, but I'm an aspiring
journalist, mo. I want to write an article
about Acedia's security and public order, mo.

rows.label: qst002301_msg0005
rows.name:
But I got caught by this
very persuasive old man...

rows.label: qst002301_msg0006
rows.name:
and he's been giving me a very
enlightening talk, so I can't move, mo.

rows.label: qst002301_msg0007
rows.name:
So please, I'm asking you
to do this for Moruru, mo!

rows.label: qst002301_msg0101
rows.name:
Mo? You haven't investigated yet, mo?
What Moruru wants to know is the number
of guards in the cathedral at night, mo.

rows.label: qst002301_msg0102
rows.name:
If you question the warrior monks
in the cathedral, I'm sure someone
will let it slip, mo.

rows.label: qst002301_msg0103
rows.name:
Now that you know, please
go with all speed, mo!

rows.label: qst002301_msg0104
rows.name:
Moruru will stay here and
listen attentively to the old
man's enlightening talk, mo.
